text:
For example you can do this:
```{% set queryparam = "category__contains=Vegan" %}
{% set table = hubdb_table_rows(5392530, queryparam) %}```
when table looks like <https://api.hubapi.com/hubdb/api/v2/tables/5392530/rows?portalId=8763939>

column_name*__contains*
column_name*__in* 

are the most useful filters for me with multiselect fields. If you want read more, <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/hubdb/v2/get_table_rows?hsLang=en|legacy docs> might be the easiest place.
